withdrawalModal.title: Withdraw reward (bonus can only extract from 5 to Validator)

stakingModel.tip2: It is not allowed to reverse pledge more than 7 times from the same node in the anti pledge cycle
stakingModel.tip3: In the anti pledge cycle, if the node is punished, the currency of the anti pledge will be deducted according to the punishment proportion
stakingModel.tip4: The pledged currency in the anti pledge period will not generate income

redelegateModel.choosepledge: Please choose the validator of the pledge.
redelegateModel.tip2: It is not allowed to transfer pledge to the same node (a - > A)
redelegateModel.tip3: It is not allowed to transfer pledge from node a to another node within the period of transferring pledge to node a
redelegateModel.tip4: In the pledge transfer cycle, there can be no more than 7 transfers from the same original node to the same target node
redelegateModel.tip5: In the period of pledge transfer, if the original node is punished, the part of currency pledged will still be deducted according to the punishment proportion

action.differentaddresses: New and old validator cannot be the same

txhash.tip: Checking transactions after trading errors is a precaution for packaging and chaining
txhash.tip1: 1: The latest transaction record on the home page contains the current transaction hash, which indicates that the transaction has been packaged and chained.
txhash.tip2: 2: Click on the latest local transaction record list on the home page to see the status of the current transaction.
txhash.tip3: 3: Search the browser for the current transaction hash or lamb address to see if the latest transaction record contains the current transaction hash

sellorder.ratetip2: High quality sales order: Odds = 1, price to be specified > = 5lamb / g / month
sellorder.ratetip3: Odds = 0.5 for regular sell orders, odds = 1 for premium sell orders

DepositModel.tip1: At the end of the voting phase, if the proposal is determined to be approved, the crowdfunding funds will be returned immediately.
DepositModel.tip2: Note: may result in forfeiture of crowdfunding deposit (14 days after proposal creation)
DepositModel.tip3: 1: at the end of deposit stage, the proposal still does not have enough 10000 lambs.
DepositModel.tip4: 2: at the end of the voting stage, the number of votes is less than 40% of the pledged amount of the whole network.
DepositModel.tip5: 3: at the end of the voting stage, more than 33.4% of the votes were strongly opposed.

com.Txalreadyexistsincache: Please check the latest transaction records in 5 minutes to confirm whether the transaction has been completed.Duplicate submission or the chain has stopped working.
com.Lesscommission: Please reduce the handling fee. The handling fee should not be greater than the balance of lamb. or lamb is running low
com.Proposaltip: The pledge is the weight of voting. If there is no pledge, the voting weight is 0
com.gastip: Tip: The handling fee will be deducted from the LAMB balance in your account. When transferring, you must ensure that the amount of LAMB in the account is sufficient to deduct the handling fee, otherwise the transaction will fail

renewal.maxDuration: Renewal time is less than 60 months

orderrevenue.tip1: Each {0} order is 1 page, with a large number of orders. The page number can be filled in as 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, etc
orderrevenue.tip2: Only {0} orders can be withdrawn at one time
orderrevenue.tip3: Extraction operation time limit {0} hour extraction once
orderrevenue.tip4: The revenue in the order is calculated every {0} hour. If the withdrawal is initiated before {0} hour, the amount withdrawn is 0

Marketoperation.Explain1: Users can participate in the operation of the market created by users through pledge.
Marketoperation.Explain2: Market revenue is composed of Commission for registration, commission for completion and Commission for renewal.
Marketoperation.Explain3: Each income in the market will be distributed according to the market pledge proportion.
Marketoperation.Explain5: Market creator receives 10% of market revenue
Marketoperation.Explain6: The market pledgor allocates the remaining 90% according to the pledge proportion (the market creator is also in the distribution set)
Marketoperation.tip: Minimum amount of market pledge {0} lamb
Marketoperation.tipneedselect: Lambdamarket is the default market, please select the market created by users.
